name: Eep! A Game of Lost Sheep
name_original: Eep! A Game of Lost Sheep
description:
Play as Mariam, a young shepherd, who has to find her five lost sheep! Journey around the nearby environments, collect items and talk to new people!  

This is my first game and was made for a school assignment! It's not the grandest, but I'm really proud of it! Feel free to let me know your impressions, as I'm eager to receive feedback and improve. 

Single-Player

Length:  ~20 minutes
